description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任全国政协副主席、民盟中央常务副主席。同时担任清华大学土木水利学院水利水电工程系博士生导师，以及华东师范大学河口海岸学国家重点实验室学术委员会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a national leader. He currently serves as the Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and the Executive Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League. He is also a doctoral supervisor in the Department of Hydraulic and Hydroelectric Engineering, School of Civil and Hydraulic Engineering, Tsinghua University, and the Chairman of the Academic Committee of the State Key Laboratory of Estuarine and Coastal Research at East China Normal University.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, serving as the organizational form of the Chinese people's patriotic united front.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十四届会议，任期从2023年3月至2028年3月。
description.en: The 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, with a term from March 2023 to March 2028.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国河南省南阳市下辖的县，是王光谦的出生地。
description.en: A county under the administration of Nanyang City, Henan Province, China, and the birthplace of Wang Guangqian.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as 'China'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个级别，仅次于国家级正职。
description.en: A rank in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China, second only to the national-level principal position.

description.zh-cn: 对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国担任的，具有“国家级副职”以上级别职务的领导人的统称。
description.en: A collective term for leaders holding positions at or above the 'deputy state level' in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Shanghai, China.

nodes.id: 河口海岸学国家重点实验室

zh-cn: 河口海岸学国家重点实验室

description.zh-cn: 依托于华东师范大学的国家重点实验室。
description.en: A State Key Laboratory based at East China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 原位于湖北武汉的高等院校，后并入武汉大学。
description.en: A former institution of higher education in Wuhan, Hubei, which was later merged into Wuhan University.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

nodes.id: 中国科学院力学研究所

zh-cn: 中国科学院力学研究所

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院下属的专门从事力学研究的机构。
description.en: An institute under the Chinese Academy of Sciences specializing in mechanics research.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家科学技术方面的最高学术机构。
description.en: The highest academic institution in natural sciences of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国青海省西宁市的高等院校。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Xining, Qinghai, China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十一届会议，任期从2008年3月至2013年3月。
description.en: The 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, with a term from March 2008 to March 2013.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十三届会议，任期从2018年3月至2023年3月。
description.en: The 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, with a term from March 2018 to March 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，曾任青海大学校长，是王光谦的前任。
description.en: A Chinese scholar who served as the president of Qinghai University and was Wang Guangqian's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中国计算机科学家，现任青海大学校长，是王光谦的继任。
description.en: A Chinese computer scientist, current president of Qinghai University, and Wang Guangqian's successor.

nodes.id: 中国民主同盟中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国民主同盟中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国民主同盟中央委员会常务副主席，是王光谦的前任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Executive Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League and was Wang Guangqian's predecessor.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 王光谦在2023年3月10日当选为中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会副主席。
description.en: Wang Guangqian was elected as a Vice Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference on March 10, 2023.

description.zh-cn: 在中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会中，王光谦担任副主席，主席是王沪宁。
description.en: In the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC, Wang Guangqian serves as Vice Chairman under Chairman Wang Huning.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦出生于河南省镇平县。
description.en: Wang Guangqian was born in Zhenping County, Henan Province.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦是中国民主同盟的盟员。
description.en: Wang Guangqian is a member of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦自2023年3月起担任全国政协副主席，成为副国级领导人。
description.en: Since March 2023, Wang Guangqian has served as the Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, becoming a national-level deputy leader.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦作为全国政协副主席，是党和国家领导人之一。
description.en: As a Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Wang Guangqian is one of the Party and state leaders.

description.zh-cn: 1978年至1982年，王光谦在武汉水利电力学院治河工程专业学习。
description.en: From 1978 to 1982, Wang Guangqian studied River Engineering at Wuhan Institute of Hydraulic and Electric Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，王光谦获得清华大学水利工程硕士学位。
description.en: In 1985, Wang Guangqian obtained a Master's degree in Hydraulic Engineering from Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 1989年，王光谦获得清华大学水利工程博士学位。
description.en: In 1989, Wang Guangqian obtained a Doctoral degree in Hydraulic Engineering from Tsinghua University.

relationships.target: 中国科学院力学研究所

description.zh-cn: 1990年至1992年，王光谦在中国科学院力学研究所从事博士后研究。
description.en: From 1990 to 1992, Wang Guangqian was a postdoctoral researcher at the Institute of Mechanics, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 1992年起，王光谦在清华大学水利水电工程系任教，后成为博士生导师。
description.en: Starting in 1992, Wang Guangqian began teaching at the Department of Hydraulic and Hydroelectric Engineering at Tsinghua University, later becoming a doctoral supervisor.

description.zh-cn: 2009年，王光谦当选为中国科学院院士。
description.en: In 2009, Wang Guangqian was elected as an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 2013年7月至2021年10月，王光谦担任青海大学校长。
description.en: From July 2013 to October 2021, Wang Guangqian served as the president of Qinghai University.

description.zh-cn: 2021年10月，王光谦被任命为清华大学副校长。
description.en: In October 2021, Wang Guangqian was appointed as the Vice President of Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 2007年12月，王光谦当选民盟常务委员。
description.en: In December 2007, Wang Guangqian was elected as a member of the Standing Committee of the China Democratic League.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年，王光谦当选为第十一届全国政协常务委员。
description.en: In 2008, Wang Guangqian was elected as a member of the Standing Committee of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 2012年12月，王光谦当选民盟中央副主席，并于2017年12月连任。
description.en: In December 2012, Wang Guangqian was elected Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League and was re-elected in December 2017.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2018年1月，王光谦当选为第十三届全国政协委员。
description.en: In January 2018, Wang Guangqian was elected as a member of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国民主同盟中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年12月，王光谦当选民盟中央常务副主席。
description.en: In December 2022, Wang Guangqian was elected Executive Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 武汉水利电力学院后来并入武汉大学，其相关院系成为武汉大学的一部分（如武汉大学水利水电学院）。
description.en: Wuhan Institute of Hydraulic and Electric Engineering was later merged into Wuhan University, and its related departments became part of Wuhan University (e.g., the School of Water Resources and Hydropower Engineering).

description.zh-cn: 王光谦接替梁曦东，出任青海大学校长。
description.en: Wang Guangqian succeeded Liang Xidong as the president of Qinghai University.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦卸任青海大学校长，由史元春接任。
description.en: Wang Guangqian stepped down as the president of Qinghai University, and was succeeded by Shi Yuanchun.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦接替陈晓光，出任中国民主同盟中央委员会常务副主席。
description.en: Wang Guangqian succeeded Chen Xiaoguang as the Executive Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League.

relationships.source: 中国民主同盟中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟中央委员会是中国民主同盟的最高领导机构。
description.en: The Central Committee is the highest leading body of the China Democratic League.
